home.title: What do you want to do?
home.subtitle: Choose a tool to get started.

upload.dropzone: Drag & drop your file here, or click to browse
upload.errorConnect: Could not connect to the API. Is the processor service running?

video-bg-remove.label: Remove Video Background
video-bg-remove.description: Remove the background from a video and export with transparency in WebP, GIF, MOV, or PNG.

image-bg-remove.label: Remove Image Background
image-bg-remove.description: Remove the background from a single image and export as PNG or WebP with transparency.

image-convert.label: Convert Image Format
image-convert.description: Convert an image to a different format with optional resizing and quality control.

video-convert.label: Convert Video Format
video-convert.description: Convert a video to a different format, codec, or resolution with full control over quality.

fps.label: Frames per second
fps.description: Number of frames extracted per second. Lower values produce smaller files but choppier animation.

resolution.label: Resolution
resolution.description: Scale the output to a specific width. Height is adjusted automatically to keep the aspect ratio.

model.label: AI model
model.description: Fast is quicker but less precise. Quality gives better edges. ISNet is optimized for precise object segmentation.

refine_edges.label: Refine edges
refine_edges.description: Uses alpha matting to smooth edges and remove white halos. Slower but much better edge quality.

fg_threshold.label: Foreground threshold
fg_threshold.description: Pixels above this value are considered definite foreground. Higher values are more conservative (0-255).

bg_threshold.label: Background threshold
bg_threshold.description: Pixels below this value are considered definite background. Lower values are more conservative (0-255).

erode_size.label: Erode size
erode_size.description: How much to shrink the mask before refining. Larger values remove more edge artifacts but may trim the subject.

quality.label: Quality
quality.description: Higher values produce better quality but larger files.

resize.label: Resize width
resize.description: Scale the image to a specific width. Height is adjusted automatically to keep the aspect ratio.

codec.label: Codec
codec.description: H.264 is the most compatible. H.265 gives better compression. VP9 is great for web. ProRes is for pro video editing. Copy skips re-encoding.

audio.label: Audio
audio.description: Keep or remove the audio track from the output video.
